channel.title: SoulScape-X
channel.description:
[size=36pt]SoulScape-X 317 ;D[/size]
[size=36pt] Development Team Needed -Coders[/size]
If you want to be apart of this Develpment Post or Pm I have A Website But im not sure if i can Post link to website. If you Want The Website Link post or pm
This is A Econemy Based Server And Not A pickup server. (picture Are Comeing soon)
~Chapter One~Added Models
Vesta long<---Working Spec 100% Vesta Top Vesta Skirt Vesta Helm Stats Helm Stats Top Stats skirt Stats "War Hammer" <---Working Spec 100% Chaotic Moul Chaotic Reaper Dragon Claw's <----Well coded spec 100000% Dragon Full Helm Dragon Shield <-----(100% Working Right Click Operation) Dragon Plate All Divine Shields<--All Divein Effects worK
~Chapter 2~Skills (No Custom Skill)
Farming Added <-- 100% Fishing is 100% <--Can fish up to Anchovy to Rocktail Agility <---100% Woodcuting <--100% Cooking <--can cook to anchovy up to *Rocktail* Mineing 100% smithing <--100% need 99 to make Dfs and you need to get a sigil And Make it. The Rest off The Skills Are 80-99% good
~Chapter-3-Prayer's~ All Original Prayer 100%
~Chapter-4-New Prayers~Epic-ness!~ (This is The Fisrt Every Working New Prayers :D for 317 with emote!) SoulSplit 80% coded Custum Gfx And Animation * Berserker 99% coded Custum Gfx And Animation Leech Range Prayer 90%coded Custum Gfx and animation All The Orther Curse Prayers Are 99% Perfect. One Custum Prayer <--Made my Self.
Chapter-5-~pvp~b/h~
Perfect Pvp loot You Get There Loot and A Bonus Loot And you get Stats Depending on What Stats You Got you Get 100k--5mil Well coded Pvp Armor/Weps
Chapter~6~SoulPoints What Are SoulPoints? SoulPoints Are used To Exchange Points for Items How do i Get SoulPoints? 1)you Can Do Any Skill And Get SoulPoints. 2)Kill Npc 3)Pvp
Chapter~7~miniGames~ Pest Control<--100% Barbassoult<----100% Clan Wars<--100% Gwd 100%<--Good Drops Castle Wars And More
Chapter~8~Normal Commands ::commands ::vote ::fourm ::Rep ::repinfo ::barrows ::pc ::farming ::Rzp ::gwd And Alot More
Chapter~9~Mod Commands
::xTeleto ::xTeletome ::Teleall ::hail ::blackmark ::commands ::jail ::ipban ::ban All normal commands and alot more
Chapter 10~AdminCommands
All normal and mod commands ::giveadmin (username) ::givemems (username) ::givemod (username) ::kick (username) ::cash ::runes
Chapter~10 Doner Commands ::donerzone ::cash And Doner Rank
Chapter~11 Clan Working clan Chat 100% clan setup lootshare 100% <---if you Get loot it will say ~(username)~ Has Goten 2x god Sard or What Ever Item You Got Clan Wars And alot more.
Chapter~12 Mage~ Blitz 100% Barrage 100% Multi Barrage 80% blood Blitz 90% <----Works Veng 100%<--Veng Delay teleorther 100% Monster Teleport home teleport Tabs All Luner Spells Are Around 70% good and The Orther Spells.
Chapter 13~This Rsps Fourm ~ I made My own Rsps Forums Just For This Rsps called SoulScapex. Im not gonna post link Because im not sure If im Breaking rules or not. The Fourm Has about 7 Catagorys and about 20 topics Custom Fourm Page Really Awesome And Took Alot off Effort and time.
Chapter 14~About me~ I love to code To me I think codeing is Fun And interesting I love to play me some Black ops and play some call of duty World At war :D
Chapter 15~Source The Source im making atm took me a bit long to make and its my First Source That i like and Wanna Get it online.
[size=36pt]Pictures Coming soon[/size]
[size=36pt]Read This Thread Carefully Please ;D[/size]

item.title: SoulScape-X
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Hey i’d really be interested in this i was going to look for a dev team when i got on thismorning.
im pretty good with rsps mainly a 317 and 508 never been able to get into anything higher yet.
so i got some pretty good experience when it comes down to coding or assistance in that.
made atleast 4 private servers of my own (100%) hosted them all before never got anywhere because i move alot,
but now im in a stable place been putting my days in on this labtop coding my server looking for a opportunity like this.
so if the offer is still open pm me or just report and we can talk some more.
ps. i really like how you organized your thread,and the fact that you have the “Loot share” working means alot,
i havn’t seen any other servers out there atm with that option 100% With announcement. Excellent Job!

Read full topic
